name: Olimpiada '96
overview: Olimpiada '96 is a simple sport game for up to four players, featuring six Olympic events: 100 meters run, javelin throw, hammer throw, archery, skeet shooting, long jump. This is a classic pure joystick-waggling game. Three disciplines allow to determine the angle of throw or jump, two require fast aiming skills. In Olympic mode each event allows to execute just one single attempt, training mode has no such restriction.
